# visang

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`visang` allows you to easily calculate visual angles.

## Installation

Install the development version of visang, with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gretat/visang.prog")
```
## Shiny App

Run the shiny app with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
visang::run_shiny()
```
